title: Cinesound review
brief_description: A compilation of newsreel items from the mid 1950s in Australia including: 1. Olympic walk trials. 2. 5-year-old learns to swim. 3. Breeding of Samoyeds. 4. New Guinea gold. 5. Stunt driver leaps house. 6. Female lifesavers carnival. 7. Impressive diorama of Shaggy Ridge (PNG). 8. Litter of 14 red setters. 9. American female golfer. 10. Bush kids get the drill.
